sourcesContent:
<template>
<el-autocomplete
        v-model="state1"
        :fetch-suggestions="querySearch"
        clearable
        
        size="large"
        
        placeholder="Search a country/region"
        :prefix-icon="Search"
        @select="handleSelect"
      />
</template>

<script>
export default {
    data() {
      return {
        restaurants: [],
        state1: ''
      };
    },
    methods: {
      querySearch(queryString, cb) {
        var restaurants = this.restaurants;
        var results = queryString ? restaurants.filter(this.createFilter(queryString)) : restaurants;
        // 调用 callback 返回建议列表的数据
        cb(results);
      },
      createFilter(queryString) {
        return (restaurant) => {
          return (restaurant.value.toLowerCase().indexOf(queryString.toLowerCase()) === 0);
        };
      },
      loadAll() {
        return [
          {"value": "Russia"},
          {"value": "Ukraine"}
        ];
      },
      handleSelect(item) {
        console.log(item);
      }
    },
    mounted() {
      this.restaurants = this.loadAll();
    }
}
</script>


<style scoped>
/* .el-autocomplete-- */
</style>
